page.title: 06LOCAL NEWSPAPER_CANON PYON
page.content: {'The Pyonear'}began in May 1979 with four local unpaid editors.It won 3rd. prize in the Hereford & Worcester Rural Community Council's Village Ventures 1982 Competition.Published in Weobley every month,{'The Pyonear'}is distributed to the local shops.It is required reading for anyone who wants to know about local events.There is an editorial,pages on the British Legion, churches,School,W.I.,recipes,Over 60's Club,local news,history, jokes and quotations, letters,Civic news,Parish Hall,Drama Group, useful information, adverts,coming events etc. Circulation is around 325 copies per month, with several being sent to people outside the area.Usual edition is 24 pages and costs 15p.One of the editors,a good artist, each month designs an appropriate cover, which is used as a colouring competition for children.
